comments:
I sometimes get an exception from the background thread of the info plugin. It seems as if there is some kind of concurrency problem. I have two VOs defined (geclipse (which is on EGEE) and jku (which is on AustrianGrid)), the information of those two VOs comes from different BDII servers, maybe that causes the problem.

Here is the exception:

An internal error occurred during: "ldap://agrid.uibk.ac.at:2170 fetch".

java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
